title: Land @ House for sale
details:
A bit of old house with rata ulu. four bed rooms with electricity and water service, perches and multy crops such as Jack/ Dooriyam/Peper/ Karabu/ Avocado/ Jambola/ Delum/ etc..
A Parapet wall around the front side of the land and the rest with covered by a fence.
Calm a quite environment with respectable families .A big gate at the entrance and having a large garage.
Carpeted roads and a concrete roads up to the land.
